column1: This light is very pretty.
I wonder who's producing it?
I wonder
why you aren't confused
even when you ended up here?
Who are you? What do you mean by “confused”?
My name is Kage Mimeima
This is the mirror world I created.
So you can do that?
Amazing…
My intent is for those who are confused by the meteorites to be trapped here.
But it doesn't work on you.
It's very surprising.
I wonder?
Probably because I'm never thinking at all.
So that's why.
I thought this was a foolproof trap.
I didn't think there were humans with this ability.
I'm not a human.
But why did you set this trap?
To catch passing wildlife?
Well, I never intended to harm anyone,
just to trap those who would interfere with our plan.
But why would you stumble into this trap
when you're clearly not affected by its magic?
I just think these lights are veeery pretty.
Nothing else.
You truly live up to the name of a thoughtless youkai,
but luck is on our side after all.
Since you came here, don't think about leaving anymore.
Your power poses too much of a threat.
I'll take care of you here once and for all.
